item.description: up: âŒ¨ï¸Script matchNameãŒä¸€è‡´ã™ã‚‹ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’å†å¸°ã§å…¨éƒ¨è¿”ã™ã€‚ä½•ã‹ã¨ä¾¿åˆ©ã€‚ /** * ç‰¹å®šã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¿”ã™ * @param {*} rootObj ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ¤ãƒ¼ã§ã‚‚ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã§ã‚‚OK * @param {*} nestingLevel 0ã§OK * @param {*} matchName æ¢ã—ãŸã„ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®matchName * @returns */ function returnProp(rootObj, nestingLevel, matchName) { var propTo = []; dumpPropTree(rootObj, nestingLevel, matchName); function dumpPropTree(rootObj, nestingLevel, matchName) { var countProps = rootObj.numProperties; for (var propIndex = 1; propIndex <= countProps; propIndex++) { var prop = rootObj.property(propIndex); if (prop.matchName == matchName) { propTo.push(prop) return; } else { dumpPropTree(prop, nestingLevel + 1, matchName); } } } return propTo; }
